== Description ==
Looks up the blog URL based on the blog name as a search term.

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$blogname|string|The name of the blog to look for.}}

== Return Values ==
; <tt>(string)</tt> : Returns the blog url.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_blogaddress_by_name($blogname); ?>%%%
